skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter writing challenge
des: This skill offers a unique letter-writing challenge every day for 30 days. Some of these writing prompts will make you laugh, some will make you think, and some will make your heart feel full! Take the 30-day writing challenge and see how many days you can complete.
